modelIdentification.name: NETN-MRM
modelIdentification.purpose: The purpose of NETN-MRM is to support federations where models are represented at multiple levels of resolution and where the level of resolution can change dynamically during a simulation.
modelIdentification.description:
Models of real-world objects, processes and phenomena are used to create a synthetic representation suitable for simulation. Depending on the purpose and requirements of the simulation, the models can have different levels of resolution and aggregation can be used to create representations of broader combined concepts.
The NATO Education and Training Network Multi-Resolution Modelling (NETN-MRM) FOM Module is a specification of how to perform aggregation and disaggregation of aggregated representation of entities, e.g. units, into other levels of aggregation or individual entities, e.g. platforms, in a federated distributed simulation.
The MRM FOM module specifies interaction classes necessary to enable federation multi-resolution modelling. The specification is based on IEEE 1516 High Level Architecture (HLA) Object Model Template (OMT) and is primarily intended to support interoperability in a federated simulation (federation) based on HLA. An HLA-based Federation Object Model (FOM) is used to specify types of data and their encoding on the network. The NETN-MRM FOM module is available as an XML file for use in HLA-based federations.
modelIdentification.useLimitation: NETN-MRM covers the following cases: * Aggregation of entities representing subunits and/or physical entities * Disaggregation of entities representing a unit into entities representing subunits and/or physical entities * Division of simulated entities into parts - resources divided and all entities simulated * Merge of previously divided entities.
modelIdentification.useHistory: v1.1 - Initial version of NETN-MRM FOM Module released as part of NETN-FOM v2.0.
v2.0 - Updated version by MSG-163 to be part of NETN-FOM v3.0.
v3.0 - Updated version by MSG-191 to be part of NATO-FOM v4.0

poc.pocName: MSG-106 Enhanced CAX Architecture, Desing and Methodology
MSG-134 NATO Distributed Simulation Architecture & Design, Compliance Testing and Certification
MSG-163 Evolution of NATO Standards for Federated Simulation
MSG-191 NATO Standards for Federated Simulation and Services for Integration, Verification and Certification

Above license gives you the right to use and redistribute the NETN FOM Module (XML file and Documentation) in its entirety without modification. You are also allowed to develop your own new FOM Modules (in separate XML files and separate documentation) that build-on/extends the NETN module by reference. You are NOT allowed to modify the NETN FOM Module or its documentation without prior permission by the NATO Modelling and Simulation Group.

objectClass.name: AggregateEntity
objectClass.semantics: A group of one or more separate objects that operate together as part of an organization. These objects may be discrete, may be other aggregate objects, or may be a mixture of both.

attribute.name: Callsign
attribute.semantics: Required. A name for the entity. Callsigns should be unique in the context in which they are used but not required to be globally unique.

attribute.name: Unit
attribute.semantics: Optional: Reference to an existing NETN-ORG `Unit` object that is represented by this `AggregateEntity`. Default value is all zeros.

attribute.name: ParentAggregate
attribute.semantics: Optional. If this AggregateEntity is the result of a disaggregation, this attribute references back to the AggregateEntity that was disaggregated. The default value is all zeros.

attribute.name: DisaggregatedEntities
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to the disaggregated entities after this AggregateEntity has been disaggregated. Each element should refer to an existing entity in the federation. Status of this AggregateEntity shall be inactive if disaggregated entities exist.

attribute.name: SourceAggregate
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to an active NETN_Aggregate instance, the source of a NETN-MRM division. The default value is all zeros representing no source AggregateEntity.

attribute.name: DividedEntities
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to other aggregate or physical entities divided from the AggregateEntity to represent specific subsets of holdings.

attribute.name: MountedOn
attribute.semantics: Optional. Mounting progress and reference to the host entity.

attribute.name: MountedEntities
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to entities mounted on and transported by this AggregateEntity.

attribute.name: EntityList
attribute.semantics: Optional. This attribute provides data on all equipment, and lifeforms associated with this AggregateEntity, e.g. platforms, weapons, sensors and personnel.

attribute.name: Destination
attribute.semantics: Optional. The current destination of movement.

attribute.name: Route
attribute.semantics: Optional. The current path of movement.

attribute.name: SuppliesStatus
attribute.semantics: Optional. The type and quantities of supplies available (on hand) to the entity. If not provided, the amount of available supplies is undefined.

attribute.name: EquipmentStatus
attribute.semantics: Optional. This summarizes the health status of the equipment comprising the aggregate. If not provided, the status of equipment is undefined.

attribute.name: PersonnelStatus
attribute.semantics: Optional. This summarizes the health status of personnel comprising the aggregate. If not provided, the status of personnel is undefined.

attribute.name: VisualSignature
attribute.semantics: Optional: Describes the susceptibility to electro-optical detection.

attribute.name: HUMINTSignature
attribute.semantics: Optional: Describes the susceptibility to human intelligence (HUMINT), i.e. information collected and provided by human sources.

attribute.name: ElectronicSignature
attribute.semantics: Optional: Describes the susceptibility to electronic detection both as a summary value and by identifying aggregate sensors together with their operational status.

attribute.name: CombatValue
attribute.semantics: Optional. A summary value (in percent) of the effectiveness based on the level of training, leadership, morale, personnel and equipment operational status, etc. The default value is 100%.

attribute.name: CoverStatus
attribute.semantics: Optional. Describes the entity's protection from the effects of weapons fire. Default is 0% - Fully affected by weapon fire.

attribute.name: CaptureStatus
attribute.semantics: Optional: The status of with respect to its control or influence over its own activities.

attribute.name: WeaponsControlOrder
attribute.semantics: Optional. Describes current Weapon Control Order Free, Tight, or Hold. Default is 0 - Other.

attribute.name: HigherHeadquarters
attribute.semantics: Optional. A reference to an entity representing the superior or headquarters from which orders can be given and to which reports are sent. The referenced entity is a NETN-ORG `Unit` object. The default value is all zeros (no higher headquarters).

attribute.name: Echelon
attribute.semantics: Optional. The size of the AggregateEntity (level of command).

objectClass.name: Lifeform
objectClass.semantics: A living military platform (human or not).

attribute.name: SourceAggregate
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to an active `AggregateEntity` instance from which this physical entity was divided. The default value is all zeros representing no source entity.

attribute.name: MountedOn
attribute.semantics: Optional. Mounting progress and reference to the host entity.

objectClass.name: Platform
objectClass.semantics: A physical object under the control of armed forces upon which sensor, communication, or weapon systems may be mounted.

attribute.name: MountedOn
attribute.semantics: Optional. Mounting progress and reference to the host entity.

attribute.name: EquipmentItem
attribute.semantics: Optional: Reference to a NETN-ORG EquipmentItem that is represented by this Platform. Default value is all zeros.

attribute.name: ParentAggregate
attribute.semantics: Optional. If this Platform is the result of a disaggregation, this attribute references back to the AggregateEntity that was disaggregated. The default value is all zeros.

attribute.name: SourceAggregate
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to an active Aggregate instance from which this physical entity was divided. If not published, merging is not supported. The default value is all zeros representing no source entity.

attribute.name: MountedEntities
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to platforms or lifeforms mounted on this platform.

interactionClass.name: MRM_Interaction
interactionClass.semantics: Base class for all MRM interactions.

parameter.name: EventId
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier for all MRM interactions belonging to the same request/respons event.

interactionClass.name: Request
interactionClass.semantics: A base class for all MRM Request events to be performed on the specified AggregateEntity.

parameter.name: AggregateEntity
parameter.semantics: Required for all requests except QuerySupportedCapabilities. Unique identifier for the NETN_Aggregate for which this request is related to.

interactionClass.name: Aggregate
interactionClass.semantics: Instruction to the AggregateFederate to perform aggregation of the specified AggregateEntity's parts.

parameter.name: RemoveDisaggregatedEntities
parameter.semantics: Optional. Indicates if the disaggregated entities of the referenced AggregateEntity should be deleted after aggregation or not. Default is TRUE - all disaggregated entities shall be deleted and the DisaggregatedEntities attribute is set to empty . If FALSE, the status of all disaggregated entities shall be set to inactive and the DisaggregatedEntities attribute of the AggregateEntity shall keep reference to all disaggregated entities.

interactionClass.name: Disaggregate
interactionClass.semantics: Instruction to perform a full disaggregation of an AggregatedEntity.

interactionClass.name: Divide
interactionClass.semantics: Instruction to divide the simulated AggregateEntity into multiple simulated object.

parameter.name: Equipment
parameter.semantics: Optional. Amount of equipment of different type and health status to be divided.

parameter.name: Personnel
parameter.semantics: Optional. Amount of personnel of different type and health status to be divided.

parameter.name: Supplies
parameter.semantics: Optional. Amount of supplies to divide.

parameter.name: RegisterPhysicalEntities
parameter.semantics: Optional. If true all Equipment of type Platform and Lifeform are published as individual objects in the federation.

interactionClass.name: Merge
interactionClass.semantics: Instruction to merge the simulated AggregateEntity with specified divided entities.

parameter.name: DividedEntities
parameter.semantics: Required. A subset of identifiers from the DividedEntities attribute of the referenced AggregateEntity. The set of identifiers indicate which divided entities are to be merged back with the AggregateEntity.

interactionClass.name: Response
interactionClass.semantics: A response from the receiving federate indicating ability to comply with request.

parameter.name: Status
parameter.semantics: Required. Specifies the result of the request action. TRUE indicates success.

interactionClass.name: CapabilitiesSupported
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent in respons to a QuerySupportedCapabilities request. The respons include a list of names of the supported capabilities for the AggregateEntity specified in the query. The names are one or more of "Aggregate", "Disaggregate", "Divide", "Merge", "Activate" and "Inactivate".

parameter.name: CapabilityNames
parameter.semantics: Required. A list of names of the supported capabilities for the Aggregate entity specified in the query. The names are one or more of "Aggregate", "Disaggregate", "Divide", "Merge", "Activate" and "Inactivate".

interactionClass.name: QuerySupportedCapabilities
interactionClass.semantics: A request to query the capabilities of a specified federate to provide support for MRM events. The queried federate shall respond with a CapabilitiesSupported interaction.

parameter.name: FederateApplication
parameter.semantics: Required: The federate to be queried.

enumeratedData.name: CaptureStatusEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: The status of a simulated entity with respect to their control or influence over their own activities. Default: 1 - Not Captured.

enumeratedData.name: ConcealmentEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: The reason for the objects concealment

enumeratedData.name: SensorStateEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: The emission states of aggregate sensors

arrayData.name: ArrayOfResourceStatus
arrayData.semantics: The array of health states for a named resource.

arrayData.name: ArrayOfEntityStruct
arrayData.semantics: Data for one or more entities that comprise an entity list.

arrayData.name: ArrayOfSensorStruct
arrayData.semantics: Array with definitio0ns of sensors, 1+ cardinality

field.name: DVOSignaturePercent
field.semantics: A summary percentage of entity susceptibility to detection by direct view optics, i.e. the human eye, binoculars, or telescopes. An entity with zero percent signature would be concealed from DVO detection.

field.name: I2SignaturePercent
field.semantics: A summary percentage of entity susceptibility to detection by Image Intensifying sensors. An entity with zero percent signature would be invisible to image intensifiers (I2).

field.name: ThermalSignaturePercent
field.semantics: A summary percentage of entity susceptibility to detection by thermal sensors. An entity with zero percent signature would be invisible to thermal sensors.

fixedRecordData.name: MissionStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: The operational task the aggregate has been ordered to perform, the time the mission was assigned, and the estimated completion time.

field.name: StartTime
field.semantics: An optional field providing the mission start time

field.name: EndTime
field.semantics: An optional field providing the mission estimated end time

field.name: MissionEnum
field.semantics: The mission assigned to the aggregate

fixedRecordData.name: HUMINTSignatureStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Describes the entity susceptibility to human intelligence (HUMINT), i.e. information collected and provided by human sources.

field.name: HUMINTSignaturePercent
field.semantics: A summary percentage of an aggregates susceptibility to detection by human intelligence collectors. Zero percent signature means an aggregate is impervious to HUMINT.

fixedRecordData.name: ElectronicSignatureStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: A summary percentage of an aggregates susceptibility to detection of its electronic emissions. Zero percent means that the aggregate has no electronic emissions.

field.name: ElectronicSignaturePercent
field.semantics: A summary percentage of an aggregates susceptibility to detection of its electronic emissions. Zero percent means that the aggregate has no electronic emissions.

field.name: SensorArray
field.semantics: A list of sensors owned by the aggregate together with their respective operational status and range

fixedRecordData.name: ResourceStatusNumberStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: The name of a resource and the number of instances of that resource by health status.

field.name: NumberHealthyOrIntact
field.semantics: The number of healthy or intact resources

field.name: NumberSlightlyDamaged
field.semantics: The number of slightly damaged resources

field.name: NumberModeratelyDamaged
field.semantics: The number of moderately damaged resources

field.name: NumberSignificantlyDamaged
field.semantics: The number of significantly damaged resources

field.name: NumberDestroyed
field.semantics: The number of destroyed or consumed resources

field.name: ResourceName
field.semantics: The name of the resource

field.name: ResourceType
field.semantics: The type of the resource (as described in the Bit Encoded Values for Use with Protocols for Distributed Interactive Simulation Applications)

fixedRecordData.name: EntityStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: An entity represented to the federation as part of the aggregate object which owns it.

field.name: Callsign
field.semantics: The callsign of the entity if available.

field.name: EntityCategory
field.semantics: Indicates whether the entity is equipment, person, emitter, etc.

field.name: EntityStatus
field.semantics: The damage state of the entity.

field.name: IsDistinctObject
field.semantics: A BaseEntity object has been created to represent this entity (true) or not (false). Default is false.

field.name: IsUnavailable
field.semantics: This entity is in use by another object (true) or not (false). Default is false.

field.name: Facing
field.semantics: Direction is measured in degrees clockwise from orientation of the entity. Default is 0.

field.name: Concealment
field.semantics: Indicates whether the entity is concealed and, if so, how

field.name: OffsetLocation
field.semantics: The entity location given as an offset from the location of the aggregate entity in meters.

field.name: Allocation
field.semantics: Reference to an entity by UUID to which this entity is allocated as a resource. The referenced entity may or may not be represented in the federation.

fixedRecordData.name: SensorStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Defines a sensor,operational status, damage status, coverage and ID

field.name: SensorStateEnum
field.semantics: The operational status of the sensor

field.name: SensorDamageState
field.semantics: The damage status of the sensor

field.name: SensorCoverage
field.semantics: The maximum range of the sensor

field.name: SensorID
field.semantics: A sensor owned by the aggregate

fixedRecordData.name: MountStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: The current progress of the mounting of an entity.

field.name: Entity
field.semantics: Required: The entity on which the mounting takes place.

field.name: Progress
field.semantics: Required: The progress of a mounting operation. 100% = mounting completed.

note.label: netn-mrm_1
note.semantics: NETN-MRM FOM Module v1.1.1 was developed by MSG-106 and released 2014-05-15.

note.label: netn-mrm_2
note.semantics: * Changed Filename to NETN-MRM.xml * Changed `modelIdentification` `securityClassification` from `unclassified` to `Not Classified` * Changed `modelIdentification` `other` to include license information * Changed `modelIdentification` `reference` to only refer to directly dependent FOM Modules * Added `modelIdentification` `useLimitation` to reflect Scope of FOM Module * Added `modelIdentification` `glyph` * Updated `modelIdentification` `purpose` to reflect Purpose of FOM Module * Updated `modelIdentification` `description` to reflect Introduction of FOM Module * Updated `modelIdentification` `name` to NATO Education and Training Network (NETN) Multi-Resolution Modelling (MRM) Module * Updated `modelIdentification` `poc` to include Release authority, Primary authors and Contributors * Updated `modelIdentification` `applicationDomain` to empty. * Removed NETN-MRM dependency on NETN-TMR. * Merged NETN-Aggregate to NETN-MRM. * Removed InteractionClass `MRM_Object` * Removed InteractionClass `MRM_TriggerResponse` * Removed InteractionClass `MRM_Trigger` * Renamed InteractionClass `MRM_DisaggregationRequest` * Renamed InteractionClass `MRM_AggregationRequest` * Removed InteractionClass `MRM_DisaggregationResponse` * Removed InteractionClass `MRM_AggregationResponse` * Removed InteractionClass `MRM_CancelRequest` * Removed InteractionClass `MRM_ActionComplete` * Added InteractionClass `MRM_Interaction` * Added InteractionClass `Request` * Added InteractionClass `Aggregate` * Added InteractionClass `Disaggregate` * Added InteractionClass `Divide` * Added InteractionClass `Merge` * Added InteractionClass `Inactivate` * Added InteractionClass `Activate` * Added InteractionClass `QuerySupportedCapabilities` * Added InteractionClass `CapabilitiesSupported` * Added InteractionClass `Response` * Removed datatype `AggregateStateEnum32` * Removed datatype `EntityListVariableLengthStruct` * Removed datatype `UpdateTypeEnum32` * Removed datatype `SupportRelationshipStruct` * Removed datatype `FacingDegreesFloat32` * Removed datatype `CoverStatusStruct` * Removed datatype `CoverEnum8` * Removed datatype `CombatValueFloat64` * Removed datatype `SupportRelationshipEnum8` * Removed datatype `EchelonEnum8` * Removed datatype `PercentageUint32` * Renamed datatype `NonComplianceReasonEnum` to `MRM_ResponseStatusEnumType` * Replaced datatype `PercentageUint32` with `PercentUnsignedInteger32` * Replaced datatype `FacingDegreesFloat32` with `DirectionDegreesFloat32` * Replaced datatype `TimeSecInt64` with `EpochTimeSecInt64` * Moved datatype `QuantityFloat64` to NETN-BASE * Changed datatype of `NETN_Aggregate.Mounted` to `PercentFloat64` * Changed datatype of `NETN_Aggregate.SourceUnit` to `UuidArrayOfHLAbyte16` * Changed datatype of `NETN_Aggregate.Symbol` to `SymbolIdentifier` * Changed datatype of `NETN_Aggregate.Footprint` to `GeocentricPolygon ` * Added attribute `Route` for object class `NETN_Aggregate` * Added attribute `Destination` for object class `NETN_Aggregate` * Updated semantics of attribute `NETN_Aggregate.UniqueId` * Renamed attribute `NETN_Aggregate.UniqueID` to `NETN_Aggregate.UniqueId` * Renamed attribute `Symbol` of `NETN_Aggregate` to `SymbolId` * Renamed attribute `UnitEquipment` of `NETN_Aggregate` to `EquipmentStatus` * Renamed attribute `UnitPersonnel` of `NETN_Aggregate` to `PersonnelStatus` * Renamed attribute `UnitSupplies` of `NETN_Aggregate` to `Supplies` * Removed attribute `Footprint`of `NETN_Aggregate` object class * Removed attribute `SupportUnit` of `NETN_Aggregate` object class * Added field `ResourceType` to datatype `ResourceStatusNumberStruct` * Changed datatype of attribute `CoverStatus` of `NETN_Aggregate` to `PercentFloat64` * Changed datatype of attribute `CombatValue` of `NETN_Aggregate` to `PercentFloat64` * Changed datatype of attribute `EntityList` of `NETN_Aggregate` to `ArrayOfEntityStruct` * Changed datatype of attribute `Echelon` of `NETN_Aggregate` to `EchelonEnum32` * Added field `UnitAllocation` to datatype `EntityStruct`

note.label: netn-mrm_3
note.semantics: * Changed datatype `TransactionId` to `UUID` * Replaced all use of Array datatype `NETN_ArrayOfSupplyStruct` with `SupplyStructArray` * Replaced all use of `PercentUnsignedInteger32` with `PercentFloat32` * Replaced all use of `PercentFloat64` with `PercentFloat32` * Moved attribute `SourceUnit`from NETN-Physical Platform and Lifeform object classes to the same classes in NETN-MRM and renamed to `SourceAggregate` * Moved attribute `EmbeddedUnitList`from NETN-Physical Platform object class to the same classes in NETN-MRM and rename to `MountedEntities`. * Changed datatype of `NETN_Aggregate` attribute `Route` to `ArrayOfWorldLocationStruct` * Changed datatype of `NETN_Aggregate` attribute `Destination` to `WorldLocationStruct` * Renamed `NETN_Aggregate` attribute `ParentUnit` to `ParentAggregate` * Renamed `NETN_Aggregate` attribute `SourceUnit` to `SourceAggregate` * Renamed `NETN_Aggregate` attribute `DividedUnitList` to `DividedEntities` * Renamed `NETN_Aggregate` attribute `EmbeddedUnitList` to `MountedEntities` * Renamed `NETN_Aggregate` attribute `SubunitList` to `DisaggregatedEntities` * Changed datatype of `NETN_Aggregate` attribute `Mounted` to `MountStruct` * Renamed `NETN_Aggregate` attribute `Mounted` to `MountedOn` * Moved all attributes from `NETN_Aggregate` to extend RPR-Aggregate object class `AggregateEntity` * Added attribute `Unit` to RPR-Physical `Aggregate` object class * Added attribute `ParentAggregate` to RPR-Physical `Platform` object class * Added attribute `EquipmentItem` to RPR-Physical `Platform` object class * Added attribute `MountedOn` to RPR-Physical `Platform` object class * Added attribute `MountedOn` to RPR-Physical `Lifeform` object class * Renamed parameter `RemoveSubunits` of interaction class `Aggregate` to `RemoveDisaggregatedEntities` * Renamed parameter `Subunits` of interaction class `Merge` to `DividedEntities` * Renamed parameter `RemoveUnit` of interaction class `Deactivate` to `RemoveEntity` * Renamed parameter `AggregateUnit` of interaction class `Request` to `AggregateEntity` * Moved interaction class `QueryCapabilitySupported` from subclass of `Request` to subclass of `MRM_Interaction` * Moved attribute `Federate` from interaction class `Request` to interaction class `QueryCapabilitySupported` and rename to `FederateApplication` * Removed interaction class `Activate` * Removed interaction class `Deactivate`
